summary: This is an email exchange between attorney Sigrid McCawley and an unnamed recipient regarding document preservation for litigation. McCawley provides instructions on preserving both electronic and hard copy documents related to the matter.

events.title: Document Preservation Instructions
events.description: Attorney Sigrid McCawley sends an email instructing an unnamed client to preserve all documents (electronic and hard copy) related to ongoing litigation.

keyFacts: Sigrid McCawley is acting as an attorney for an unnamed client in litigation, likely related to the Epstein case.
The email focuses on the critical legal step of document preservation for the litigation.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege.
The recipient's identity is not disclosed in the provided text.
